rules_text:
Signature – Earthranger, Moonranger, Starranger, Sunranger, Voidranger [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
Sacrifice a Vehicle: Put two +1/+1 counters on Super Robot Galaxy Rise. Then put that Vehicle's counters on Super Robot Galaxy Rise.
Crew 4
